title: Heart of the Night Grid
tags: 80s Japanese City Pop, K-R&B, Neo-Soul, Dream Pop, Sentimental, Lo-fi Groove
prompt:
[Verse 1]
Filtered static on the glass
A tape-hiss memory of the past
Then the beat clicks in, a steady pace
And the neon paints a line across my face
Cruising down a river made of light
Every color sharp, every moment bright
The slap bass walks, the synth pads gleam
Living out a pixelated dream

[Chorus]
I'm just a heart in the night grid
A schematic beating what it's bid
Tracing this one magenta line
Is this feeling even mine?
A digital soul with an analog ache
For a love the code can never make
I feel it all, a simulated break
Just a heart in the night grid

[Verse 2]
Graphite lines, a fragile frame
Whispering a forgotten name
Reflections dance on chrome and steel
Too clean to touch, too bright to feel
The clean guitar, a lonely sound
As the towers stretch all around
Each window holds a different life
Underneath this velvet knife

[Chorus]
I'm just a heart in the night grid
A schematic beating what it's bid
Tracing this one magenta line
Is this feeling even mine?
A digital soul with an analog ache
For a love the code can never make
I feel it all, a simulated break
Just a heart in the night grid

[Bridge]
Did they draw me from a photograph?
A faded smile, a silent laugh?
Or am I just a glitch, a ghost in the design
A borrowed pulse that was never truly mine?
This electric piano cries in the rain
Washing over this synthetic pain
I'm yearning for a warmth I can't recall
Just staring at the empty sprawl

[Chorus]
'Cause I'm a heart in the night grid
A schematic beating what it's bid
Tracing this one magenta line
Tell me this feeling is mine...
A digital soul with an analog ache
For a love the code can never make
I feel it all, for goodness sake
Just a heart in the night grid

[Outro]
The night grid...
Magenta line...
Fading out... a faded sign...
Just a heart...
In the grid...
